body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to CarLink Automotive. My name is Russell Roberts. May I kindly ask for your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Russell, my name is Heather Perry.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Heather. How may I assist you today with your query regarding inventory?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling happy, thank you! I would like to inquire about the availability of a specific model.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to hear that you're feeling happy, Heather! Could you please provide me with the exact model and color you are interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, I'm looking for a black sedan with leather seats.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it! Can you also confirm the year of manufacturing and the maximum price range you are considering, Heather?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The sedan should be a two zero one nine model and my price range is between two zero zero zero zero and three zero zero zero zero dollars.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Heather. Let me check our inventory database for matching vehicles. Please hold on a moment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for patiently waiting, Heather. We currently have one black two zero one nine sedan with leather seats within your price range. Would you like to schedule a viewing?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Heather. If you have any further questions, feel free to ask. Have a wonderful day!
